title: Visualize your business processes
description: The Axon.ivy Digital Business Platform allows you to document business processes fast and intuitive. A shared view on users, roles, departments and technical systems that are involved in a business process improves your work.

title: Automate your business processes
description: Documented processes are good. But what you really want is to drive your highly valuable processes automatically. An initial application that leads users through the process can be generated without the need to hire a software engineer.

title: Integrate with other systems
description: The Axon.ivy Digital Business Platform integrates well with countless different 3rd party systems (e.g. REST, Web Services, Databases, SAP, Email, Reporting).

title: Solve complex problems
description: With our Java integration you always have the ability to break out of our predefined tooling and use advanced features of Tomcat, JPA, JSF, JAX-RS or whatever you require.

title: Monitor your engines
description: We provide you effective monitoring and logging interfaces to give you confidence that the application is healthy and accessible.
